name: Flea for your life!
description:
You are a tiny flea living on top of a really big friendly dog... eventually you are discovered and now you will need to jump away form the anti-flea soap.

---

You can use a touch screen to play, touch and drag in the direction you want to move.

Alternatively you can use the right and left keys on your keyboard or controller.

---

To make this game I used the Godot Engine, Inkscape and music by TinyWorlds.
